field.name: In Facility Care for Diarrhoea with Some Dehydration | Take Action: After the First 4-hour Period
Reassess the child and classify for dehydration
If the child has signs of severe disease or dehydration refer mother/caregiver and child to a health center or hospital immediately
If the child shows sign of improvement, advise mother to breastfeed if child still breastfeeds at home frequently
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Advise mother/caregiver to return after 5 days if condition does not improve
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
